languages.text: {n}За гневным треском помех едва можно разобрать взбудораженный голос Паскаля.{/n} "Фиксирую, что контакт со скверноносной сущностью является техноересью, не подлежащей категоризации".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Паскаль бузит, что это техногрех и святотатство, и что тварь будет убита.

languages.text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."
languages.original_text: {n}За гневным треском помех едва можно разобрать взбудораженный голос Паскаля.{/n} "Фиксирую, что контакт со скверноносной сущностью является техноересью, не подлежащей категоризации".

traits.locale_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

{n}You can barely make out Pasqual's agitated voice over the angry crackle of the interference.{/n} "I am registering that the admission of a profane machine to the sacred technologies of the void vessel is a tech-heresy that defies categorization. I recommend the immediate termination of the corrupted creature to prevent the commission of an outrageous sacrilege!"
{n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

{n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that the admission of a profane machine to the sacred technologies of the void vessel is a tech-heresy that defies categorisation. I recommend the immediate termination of the corrupted creature to prevent the commission of an outrageous sacrilege!"
{n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."
{n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

languages.text: {n}怒れる干渉の歪みの中に、パスカルの動揺した声がかろうじて聞き取れる。{/n}「腐敗させる存在との接触は、カテゴリー化を超えた異端技術であると登録する」
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒れる干渉の歪みの中に、パスカルの動揺した声がかろうじて聞き取れる。{/n}「腐敗させる存在との接触は、カテゴリー化を超えた異端技術であると登録する」

languages.text: {n}Derrière les craquements furieux des interférences, vous peinez à discerner la voix agitée de Pasqal.{/n} « Je constate que le contact avec une entité corruptrice est une hérésie technologique hors catégorie. »
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière les craquements furieux des interférences, vous peinez à discerner la voix agitée de Pasqal.{/n} « Je constate que l'admission d'une machine profane dans les technologies sacrées du vaisseau du vide est une hérésie technologique qui défie toute catégorisation. Je recommande de procéder à l'élimination immédiate de la créature corrompue afin d'éviter la perpétration d'un sacrilège scandaleux ! »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡激动的声音几乎要被愤怒的静电声淹没了。{/n}“检测到与腐化实体的接触，这是一种根本无法归类的技术异端恶行。”
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音几乎要被愤怒的静电声淹没了。{/n}“探测到神圣的虚空舰正在打算接纳一台亵渎神明的机器，这是一种根本无法归类的技术异端恶行。我建议立刻终止这台被亵渎的生物，以免它犯下邪恶的亵渎行为！”

languages.text: {n}A duras penas logras entender la voz agitada de Pasqal por encima del furioso chisporroteo de las interferencias.{/n} «Registro el hecho de que el contacto con un ser corruptor es una tecnoherejía que supera toda categorización».
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas distingues la agitada voz de Pasqal con el furioso crujido de las interferencias.{/n} «Advierto que el acceso de una máquina profana a las tecnologías sagradas de la nave del vacío es una tecnoherejía que se escapa a cualquier categorización. ¡Recomiendo el cese inmediato de la criatura corrupta para evitar la perpetración de un sacrilegio deshonroso!».

languages.text: {n}Du kannst Pasqals aufgebrachte Stimme über das wütende Knistern der Interferenz kaum ausmachen.{/n} "Ich registriere, dass jeglicher Kontakt mit einer verderblichen Wesenheit eine Tech-Ketzerei fern jeder Kategorisierung ist."
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst Pasqals aufgebrachte Stimme über das wütende Knistern der Interferenz kaum ausmachen.{/n} "Ich registriere, dass die Aufnahme einer profanen Maschine in die heiligen Technologien des Raumschiffs Tech-Ketzerei jenseits jeder Kategorisierung darstellt. Ich empfehle die sofortige Terminierung der korrumpierten Kreatur, um die Begehung eines unerhörten Sakrilegs zu verhindern!"

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın öfkeli sesini, radyo parazitinin ardından zorlukla duyuyorsun.{/n} "Yozlaştırıcı bir varlıkla temasın düşünülemeyecek bir tekno kâfirlik kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely make out Pasqal's agitated voice over the angry crackle of interference.{/n} "I am registering that contact with a corrupting entity is tech-heresy beyond categorisation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal’ın öfkeli sesini, radyo parazitinin ardından zorlukla duyuyorsun.{/n} “Yozlaştıran bir varlıkla temasın düşünülemeyecek bir tekno kâfirlik olduğunu bildiririm.”
